column6: Aug 2 China suffered its worst industrial accident in a year on Saturday when an explosion killed at least 68 people and injured more than 120 at a factory in China that makes wheels for U.S. carmakers
column7: including General Motors.UPDATE 5-Factory blast in eastern China kills at least 69 * Final death toll could be "very high" - doctor   (Updates death toll
column8: adds President's call for an inquiry)
